comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Seems reasonable. Here’s a tracking issue. Not sure if/when I’ll have time to implement it.

comments.author: Guardian of Angels.9867
comments.body:
Hey there,

I was wondering if we could get a log that would only return the following types:
- invited
- joined
- rank_change
- kick

Preferably one that would only return the last week or month.

The current /v2/guild/:id/log API goes to far back, and contains unnessary extra data for my purposes.

Best of luck,
Holy
